TarzanCore::set_utilities_class ( $  class = 'TarzanUtilities'  ) 

Set Utilities Class

Set a custom class for this functionality. Perfect for extending/overriding existing classes with new functionality.

Parameters:
string $class (Optional) The name of the new class to use for this functionality. Defaults to the default class.
Returns:
void
